original_text: remember that you were at that time separated from Christ, alienated from the commonwealth of Israel and strangers to the covenants of promise, having no hope and without God in the world.
korean_text: 그 때에 너희는 그리스도 밖에 있었고 이스라엘 나라 밖의 사람이라 약속의 언약들에 대하여는 외인이요 세상에서 소망이 없고 하나님도 없는 자이더니

sentences.original_text: remember that you were at that time
alienated from the commonwealth of Israel
and strangers to the covenants of promise
and without God in the world
